text: Hi Everyone! Has anyone created some logic that would allow a user to schedule an item to be published in a local module and come down from the site based on dates / times?

I built something like this a long time ago. You could use date/time fields for a start / end dates then a combo of the `unixtimestamp()`<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#unixtimestamp| function> and `|unixtimestamp` <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#unixtimestamp|filter> to make the comparison on the dates/times.
